content:
HttpSessionStateWrapper Class

In this Article

Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides access to session-state values, session-level settings, and lifetime management methods.

Syntax

Declaration

public class HttpSessionStateWrapper : System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase
  • HttpSessionStateWrapper

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

The HttpSessionStateWrapper class derives from the HttpSessionStateBase class and serves as a wrapper for the HttpSessionState class. This class exposes the functionality of the HttpSessionState class and exposes the HttpSessionStateBase type. The HttpSessionStateBase class lets you replace the original implementation of the HttpSessionState class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

Constructors summary

HttpSessionStateWrapper(HttpSessionState)

Initializes a new instance of the HttpSessionStateWrapper class.

Properties summary

CodePage

Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.
Contents

Gets a reference to the current session-state object.
CookieMode

Gets a value that indicates whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.
Count

Gets the number of items in the session-state collection.
IsCookieless

Gets a value that indicates whether the session ID is embedded in the URL.
IsNewSession

Gets a value that indicates whether the session was created during the current request.
IsReadOnly

Gets a value that indicates whether the session is read-only.
IsSynchronized

Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection of session-state values is synchronized (thread safe).
Item(Int32)

Gets or sets a session value by using the specified index.
Item(String)

Gets or sets a session value by using the specified name.
Keys

Gets a collection of the keys for all values that are stored in the session-state collection.
LCID

Gets or sets the locale identifier (LCID) of the current session.
Mode

Gets the current session-state mode.
SessionID

Gets the unique identifier for the session.
StaticObjects

Gets a collection of objects that are declared by object elements that are marked as server controls and scoped to the current session in the application's Global.asax file.
SyncRoot

Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of session-state values.
Timeout

Gets or sets the time, in minutes, that can elapse between requests before the session-state provider ends the session.

Methods summary

Abandon()

Cancels the current session.
Add(String,Object)

Adds an item to the session-state collection.
Clear()

Removes all keys and values from the session-state collection.
CopyTo(Array,Int32)

Copies the collection of session-state values to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the array.
GetEnumerator()

Returns an enumerator that can be used to read all the session-state variable names in the current session.
Remove(String)

Deletes an item from the session-state collection.
RemoveAll()

Removes all keys and values from the session-state collection.
RemoveAt(Int32)

Deletes the item at the specified index from the session-state collection.

Constructors

  • HttpSessionStateWrapper(HttpSessionState)

    Initializes a new instance of the HttpSessionStateWrapper class.

    public HttpSessionStateWrapper (System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState httpSessionState);

    Parameters

    • httpSessionState
      HttpSessionState

      The object that this wrapper class provides access to.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      httpSessionState is null.

Properties

  • CodePage

    Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

    public override int CodePage { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The character-set identifier for the current session.

  • Contents

    Gets a reference to the current session-state object.

    public override System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase Contents { get; }

    Property Value

    • System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase

      The current session-state object.

  • CookieMode

    Gets a value that indicates whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.

    public override System.Web.HttpCookieMode CookieMode { get; }

    Property Value

    • HttpCookieMode

      One of the cookie-mode values that indicate whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions. The default is HttpCookieMode.

  • Count

    Gets the number of items in the session-state collection.

    public override int Count { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The number of items in the collection.

  • IsCookieless

    Gets a value that indicates whether the session ID is embedded in the URL.

    public override bool IsCookieless { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the session ID is embedded in the URL; otherwise, false.

  • IsNewSession

    Gets a value that indicates whether the session was created during the current request.

    public override bool IsNewSession { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the session was created during the current request; otherwise, false.

  • IsReadOnly

    Gets a value that indicates whether the session is read-only.

    public override bool IsReadOnly { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the session is read-only; otherwise, false.

  • IsSynchronized

    Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection of session-state values is synchronized (thread safe).

    public override bool IsSynchronized { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, false.

  • Item(Int32)

    Gets or sets a session value by using the specified index.

    public override object this[int index] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index of the session value.

    Property Value

    • Object

      The session-state value that is stored at the specified index.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentOutOfRangeException

      index is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.

  • Item(String)

    Gets or sets a session value by using the specified name.

    public override object this[string name] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The key name of the session value.

    Property Value

    • Object

      The session-state value that has the specified name, or null if the item does not exist.

  • Keys

    Gets a collection of the keys for all values that are stored in the session-state collection.

    public override System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection Keys { get; }

    Property Value

    • NameObjectCollectionBase+KeysCollection

      The session keys.

  • LCID

    Gets or sets the locale identifier (LCID) of the current session.

    public override int LCID { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The LCID (culture) of the current session.

  • Mode

    Gets the current session-state mode.

    public override System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateMode Mode { get; }

    Property Value

    • SessionStateMode

      The session-state mode.

  • SessionID

    Gets the unique identifier for the session.

    public override string SessionID { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The unique session identifier.

  • StaticObjects

    Gets a collection of objects that are declared by object elements that are marked as server controls and scoped to the current session in the application's Global.asax file.

    public override System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollectionBase StaticObjects { get; }

    Property Value

    • HttpStaticObjectsCollectionBase

      The objects that are declared in the Global.asax file.

  • SyncRoot

    Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of session-state values.

    public override object SyncRoot { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

  • Timeout

    Gets or sets the time, in minutes, that can elapse between requests before the session-state provider ends the session.

    public override int Timeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The time-out period, in minutes.

Methods

  • Abandon()

    Cancels the current session.

    public override void Abandon ();
  • Add(String,Object)

    Adds an item to the session-state collection.

    public override void Add (string name, object value);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the item to add to the session-state collection.

    • value
      Object

      The value of the item to add to the session-state collection.

  • Clear()

    Removes all keys and values from the session-state collection.

    public override void Clear ();
  • CopyTo(Array,Int32)

    Copies the collection of session-state values to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the array.

    public override void CopyTo (Array array, int index);

    Parameters

    • array
      Array

      The array to copy session values to

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index in array at which copying starts.

  • GetEnumerator()

    Returns an enumerator that can be used to read all the session-state variable names in the current session.

    public override System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerator

      An enumerator that can iterate through the variable names in the session-state collection.

  • Remove(String)

    Deletes an item from the session-state collection.

    public override void Remove (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the item to delete from the session-state collection.

  • RemoveAll()

    Removes all keys and values from the session-state collection.

    public override void RemoveAll ();

    Remarks

    This method performs the same function as the Clear method.

  • RemoveAt(Int32)

    Deletes the item at the specified index from the session-state collection.

    public override void RemoveAt (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index of the item to remove from the session-state collection.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentOutOfRangeException

      index is less than zero.

      - or -

      index is equal to or greater than stem.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.Count*.
